title: Is the third brake light on most late model cars part of the NC Inspection process. In other words, can a vehicle fail inspection if this light is inoperable?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/06/is-the-third-brake-light-on-late-model-cars-and-trucks-part-of-the-nc-inspection-checklist/
